customBots.label: Basic
customBots.desc: Basic Functionality: Moderation, Customisation, Simple Commands etc...

customBots.label: Intermediate
customBots.desc: Intermediate Functionality: Scraping, Simple Games, Welcome Messages etc...

customBots.label: Advanced
customBots.desc: Advanced Functionality: Customisable Economy, Shops, Music Player etc...

customBots.label: Advanced +
customBots.desc: Complex Ideas that require further discussion. You can contact via Discord or email.

modules.label: BOT Template
modules.desc: A template for a bot that is easy to use and ready for customization.
modules.fullDesc:
**What you get:**
- Step-by-step IDE setup instructions
- Clean, well-documented codebase

Perfect for beginners looking for a quick starting point!

modules.label: Welcome Messages
modules.desc: A Cog for fully customisable Welcome Messages. Drag and Drop into the template.
modules.fullDesc:
**Features:**
- Supports text and image welcomes
- Easily configurable via JSON
- Use in any bot based on the template

Just drop this cog into your bot and set your welcome style in minutes!

modules.label: Game Bundle
modules.desc: Three simple games for your community to play with eachother!
modules.fullDesc:
**Included Games:**
- TicTacToe
- Rock Paper Scissors
- Hangman

**Commands:**
- `/rps`
- `/ttt`
- `/hangman`

All games are easy to use and integrate with your existing bot. Any future 'small' games will be added to this bundle for no extra charge.

modules.label: Message Filter
modules.desc: Advanced message filter OpenAIs moderation API. You will need your own API key
modules.fullDesc:
**Features:**
- Uses [Moderation](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/moderation) for detection
- Multiple customizable trigger levels
- Simple config for your community's needs

Keep your server clean with cutting-edge AI filtering.

gameServers.label: Platinum
gameServers.desc: No caps, priority support, custom configs.
